metadata.title: CVE-2014-6029 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: TorrentFlux 2.4 allows remote authenticated users to delete or modify otherusers' cookies via the cid parameter in an editCookies action toprofile.php.

criterions.comment: torrentflux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
